EmailTemplate.description: For Jeremy Kirkland only. Use this email as a follow up if you are not able to connect via phone
EmailTemplate.name: Flex to AJ- Email 4 - Jeremy Kirkland
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we didn't connect.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day, I am sorry we weren’t able to connect to discuss the Platinum Purchasing program.
As a reminder, Platinum Purchasing is a dynamic office supply program for businesses like yours.
Benefits include: Best value core list with up to 80% off 300 frequently ordered items Custom best value core list available Store Purchasing Card available so you can receive your program pricing in store Copy & Print Services discounts include B&W at .025 cents, Color at .22 cents and 35% off finishing services Aggressive pricing on cleaning and breakroom supplies
I will try contacting you again to discuss this exciting new program.
Thank you.
Jeremy Kirkland Senior Account Manager Office DEPOT | Business Solutions Division jeremy.kirkland@officedepot.com 855.337.6811 x 2897
Office Depot® is a trademark of The Office Club, Inc. OfficeMax® is a trademark of OMX, Inc. © 2017 Office Depot, Inc. To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.business.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book. Privacy Policy
